name: Recycle Master
description:
This game is a submission to COP 26 Game Jam.

Become the mighty Greta and save the world from garbagio!

You need to recycle because you are THE Recycle Master... and it is also good for the environment.

Now, for real. Did you know that you can recycle many more things than just plastic bottles and newspapers? There are bins for batteries, aluminium, BIO waste and even charity bins for clothes. Even our game does not cover them all.

Start playing and recycling today both for free.

Made by Jiří and Lukáš.

Special thanks to undone ILOs... We will get back to work now.
